document_data.name: Pimulpekk
document_data.mainbody: '''Pimulpekk''' was the High Priest of [[Kurtulmak]] from the [[kobold]] tribe led by Chief [[Crajbek]], who laired in the infamous [[Haunted Halls]] near the village of [[Eveningstar]] in [[Cormyr]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Pimulpekk was a powerful cleric of the kobold patron [[deity]] who could sling such [[spell]]s as ''[[unholy blight]]'', ''[[greater command]]'', ''[[divine punishment]]'', [[Poison (spell)|poison]]'', and ''[[fire storm]]''.
document_data.Activities: In the 15{{th}} century DR, Pimulpekk led a band of priests of Kurtulmak as a part of Chief Crajbek. When a group of adventurers who fell through a rift to [[Toril]] from the world of [[Eberron]] investigated the haunted depths of the dungeon, they faced High Priest Pimulpekk and Crajbek, possibly slaying both and claiming the kobold tribe's looted treasures.
